tags.name: vets
tags.description: Secured Vet and Vet Tech access operations

get.summary: reports whether the API is up and running
get.description: used to check on the api status

get.summary: Returns a (filtered) collection of buildings affiliated withthe Rescue
get.description: With no parameters, returns all Buildings affiliated with the Rescue

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of items on a page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the artists to be displayed

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Specifies the first date to return in a query

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Specifies the last date to include in a query

post.summary: adds a Building to the rescue
post.description: Adds a new Building to the Rescue

requestBody.description: Building to add to the Rescue

get.summary: returns a specific Building for the Rescue
get.description: Returns details about a specific Building

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of items on a page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the artists to be displayed

put.description: Updates an existing Building by id

delete.description: Deletes an existing Building by id

patch.description: Updates an existing Building by id with only elements that are changing

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique id of Building to patch

requestBody.description: partial json object of Building with fields to patch

get.summary: searches cats
get.description: With no parameters, returns all cats currently in the shelter. Allows filters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of items on a page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the artists to be displayed

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Specifies the first date to return in a query

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Specifies the last date to include in a query

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specifies a matching pattern for the name

parameters.name: adoptionStatus
parameters.description: Specifies one of the valid AdoptionStatus values

parameters.name: breed
parameters.description: breed of cat to retrieve

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Specifies one of the valid CatColors

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Specifies on of the valid Gender

post.description: adds a Cat with a unique id

requestBody.description: full Cat object with new id

409.description: unable to apply valid change to a valid Cat

get.summary: retrieves a Cat by id
get.description: Gets an existing Cat by id

put.description: Updates an existing Cat by id

requestBody.description: unique id of Cat to update

delete.description: Deletes an existing Cat by id

patch.description: Updates an existing Cat by id with only elements that are changing

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique id of Cat to patch

requestBody.description: partial json object of Cat with fields to patch
